entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ConcurrentDictionary Test Coverage | TestGetOrAddOrUpdate #83429
  • Updating .NET Linux Build for .NET 8 #83428
  • [6.0] JIT.HardwareIntrinsics test failures in mono arm64 linux llvmaot #83426
  • [6.0] Some more doublinklist failures in mono minijit and llvmaot arm64 linux #83424
  • Revert unintentional nullability changes and fix inconsistencies in StringContent ctrs #83423
  • [6.0] Android test failure: The following constructor parameters did not have matching fixture data: _Global globalVar #83422
  • [6.0] System.Random test failure: NextInt_AllValuesAreWithinSpecifiedRange #83421
  • [API Proposal]: Aggregate streams and treat them as one #83416
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] System.Runtime.Tests failing in debug builds on main #83415
    8.0.0
  • exe file name gets truncated in .NET core mini dump name #83419
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: System.BadImageFormatException: The file is not a ReadyToRun image #83409
  • [Analyzer] Flag catch blocks for TaskCanceledException without OperationCanceledException #83406
  • Make get_hostfxr_parameters.dotnet_root behave the same on linux and windows #83403
  • Test failure: Assertion failed `m_Initialized == Initialized` in tracing/runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource.sh #83401
  • [wasm][aot] Test failure in System.Drawing.Primitives test suite #83394
  • Logging source generator generates uncompilable code for new .NET Framework project #83393
    8.0.0
  • Json source generator generates uncompilable code for new .NET Framework project #83392
  • Regressions in System.Text.Json.Tests #83398
  • Q: debugging mono core dumps #83390
  • [.NET 7]Integer auto-vectorization bug #83387
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests #83399
  • IndexOf-related regressions #83395
  • IsolatedStorageFile GetUserStoreForApplication() returns wrong path on .NET for iOS #83384
  • Consider deprecating older source generators and their associated infrastructure #83383
    8.0.0
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-preview.3.23159.20]The type of exception changed from TaskCanceledException to OperationCanceledException #83382
  • Cryptographic error "Padding is invalid and cannot be removed" after upgrading from .NET Core 3.2 to .NET 7.0.3 - hosted on IIS 10.0.17763.1 - (works on dev machine) #83381
  • [mono][aot] Enable direct call transformation for inflated methods #83379
    Future
  • [mono][aot] Enable direct call transformation for wrappers #83378
    Future
  • [mono][aot] Update nollvm methods to init themselves in its prolog #83377
    Future
  • [mono][aot] Propose initialization of nollvm methods without a PLT entry #83376
    Future
  • Investigate COMDAT folding GC info on Linux #83375
    8.0.0
  • JsonConfigurationFileParser.cs RootElement not support Array #83373
  • TLS AIA Traversal Fails on PKCS 7 (p7b) File #83366

Closed

  • System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath throws OutOfMemoryException when calling Widen(pen). #64092
    Future
  • Drawstring throws error "System.ArgumentException: Parameter is not valid." #61988
    Future
  • System.Drawing Image.Save(Stream stream, ImageFormat format) produces different results in linux and windows #58496
    Future
  • Support Svg class or ISvg interface #57679
    Future
  • NET 6 Application crashes without a StackTrace (I've a MiniDump) Code: 0xc0000374 #76875
    Future
  • [.NET 7.0.0-rc.1]System.Drawing WebP support does not work #76237
    8.0.0
  • Bitmap constructor with IntPtr wierd behavior on linux #64978
    6.0.x
  • Memory violation/corruption error with sdk7 docker image on M1 MAC #81232
    8.0.0
  • PrivateFontCollection is failed to add memory font under .Net Core #32441
    Future
  • SslStreamCertificateContext forced validation, X509Chain platform differences #41552
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Flag to include all SSL intermediate certificates explicitly in SslStreamCertificateContext #59906
    8.0.0
  • Server-side generation of images from a Canvas does not work in IIS but does in IIS Express #33121
    Future
  • Unknown Bitmap/Image compression on ubuntu (System.Drawing.Common v.3.1.1) #4118
    Future
  • Recent Issue with libgdiplus #33077
    Future
  • System.Drawing.Common EMF #33032
    Future
  • [System.Drawing.Common] Bitmap constructor thrown exception platform mismatch #32817
    Future
  • [System.Drawing.Common] Bug in printer-comment option resolution on PrintingServices.GetPrintDialogInfo() #32816
    Future
  • Cut .Tiff file works on Windows but doesn't work on Linux #38035
    Future
  • Test failure: System.Drawing.Tests.BitmapTests.LockBits_Invoke_Success(bitmap: Bitmap { Flags = 0, FrameDimensionsList = [7462dc86-6180-4c7e-8e3f-ee7333a7a483], Height = 100, HorizontalResolution = 0, Palette = ColorPalette { Entries = [...], Flags = 0 }, ... }, rectangle: {X=0,Y=0,Width=100,Height=100}, lockMode: WriteOnly, pixelFormat: Format24bppRgb, expectedStride: 300, expectedReserved: 65538) #42518
    Future
  • memory leak in FontCollection::Families() in Linux #38415
    Future
  • NotImplementedException when creating Bitmap with CMYK color space [System.Drawing.Common][.Net Core][Linux] #45645
    Future
  • Zero data loaded from EMF file [System.Drawing.Common][.Net Core][Linux] #45647
    Future
  • System.Drawing.Graphics DrawImage(Image, Rectangle) doesn't fit the picture perfectly. #41594
    Future
  • System.Drawing.Graphics memory leak #41262
    Future
  • . net core3.1 runtime. missing libgdiplus in the Linux environment #38702
    Future
  • Created CCITT 3 Fax TIF file not correct #55016
    Future
  • Graphics.DrawImageUnscaled(Bitmap, new Point(0, 0)) causes weird artifacts on Linux #47720
    Future
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.ConfigurationBinder.Bind Method ignored all the exceptions. #83385
  • Jit: move runtime lookup expansion to lower #35551
    8.0.0
  • System.Drawing.Bitmap.Clone: Why does Clone throws an OutOfMemoryException for Out-Of-Bounds problems #34395
    Future
  • Bitmap FlipRotate issue with 1bpp images #37703
    Future
  • System.Drawing: Image.Save() changes color of image #34954
    Future
  • High Efficiency Image File Format format in .NET #362
    Future
  • `System.Drawing.Common.Bitmap` throws `ArgumentException` instead of `ObjectDisposedException` when attempted to access properties #29841
    Future
  • Log version of libgdiplus to the console in System.Drawing.Common.Tests #29625
    Future
  • Consider partial implementation of System.Drawing.Region class #27814
    Future
  • LockBits return wrong BitmapData when rectangle has smaller width and height #28600
    Future
  • System.Drawing.Common runs on Linux with BUGS #29075
    Future
  • System Drawing image.fromstream parameter is not valid (HEIC File) #31061
    Future
  • System.Drawing incorrectly identifies PixelFormat in animated gifs #30197
    Future
  • A Generic error occurred in GDI+ in the Graphics.MeasureString method #30147
    Future
  • Failing unit test locally on mac: BitmapTests.GetFrameCount_NewBitmap_ReturnsZero #30043
    Future
  • System.Drawing.Font.ToLogFont(lOGFONT) fails on Linux - breaks SSRS ReportViewer #31302
    Future
  • System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits not implemented on linux #31416
    Future
  • Two System.Drawing Test failues #25717
    Future
  • Disable System.Drawing tests expected to fail on Server Core #22946
    Future
  • PrintingServices.Unix.cs is not thread safe #23656
    Future
  • vsdbg-ui stepping over interpolated string line in async Task method throws a null reference exception #83232
  • Proposal for minimalistic imaging platform #16307
    Future
  • [Bug report] gdi+ render bugs on unix platform #57694
    Future
  • Test failure System.Drawing.PrimitivesTests.PointFTests.EqualityTest_NotPointF #55168
    Future
  • Saving a cloned image after using Graphics.FromImage results in no output on Linux #55165
    Future
  • Questions about AddMemoryFont #50742
    Future
  • Zero length EMF file [System.Drawing.Common][.Net Core][Linux] #45646
    Future
  • Unable to draw certain string #40650
    Future
  • [Mono] Test failures in linux CI because libgdiplus can't be loaded #34008
    Future
  • Test failed: MonoTests.System.Drawing.Imaging.BmpCodecTest.Bitmap24bitData #13180
    Future
  • Test failed: System.Resources.Extensions.Tests.PreserializedResourceWriterTests #30184
    Future
  • DrawString SolidBrush not work in centos7 #27788
    Future
  • Graphics.MeasureString wrong result in case of the text broken into lines #25124
    Future
  • System.Drawing - bmp resolution #27900
    Future
  • Linux version of GraphicsPath.Warp wipes the path and results in an empty bitmap. #27927
    Future
  • System.Drawing.common Segfaults when manipulating images to black and white #28069
    Future
  • weird bitmap problem on linux #28236
    Future
  • Unencrypted Plain Http2 Connection fails handshake if an Antivirus Antimalware or Firewall stays in the middle and sends a packet with zero leghted Http2 Settings fame with an ACK flag set before the non empty settings frame, impacts also on the localhost #82820
    8.0.0
  • dotnet seems to abort when libmsquic exist but cannot be loaded #82316
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: Fatal error. Internal CLR error at System.GC.AllocateNewArray #83407
  • Test failure System.Net.Security.Tests.CertificateValidationRemoteServer.ConnectWithRevocation_WithCallback #82692
  • SocketsHttpHandler persistent request timeouts due to .NET 6 connection pooling behavior #81989
  • Can make http2 request from a Android device #83344
    8.0.0
  • HttpStress execution failure on Windows #82528
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Lift CSE limitations around type handles #83215
    Future
  • Using CryptoStream leaves copy of unencrypted data in shared array pool after it has been encrypted #83295
  • [release/7.0][wasm] `System.Diagnostics.Tracing.Tests` failing with chrome ` Expected 210 assets to be downloaded, but only finished 211` #82271
    7.0.x
  • PR/issue labeling bot isn't labeling #82643
    8.0.0
  • JIT: lvaPInvokeFrameRegSaveVar seems unused #83052
  • jitstress-random: Assertion failed 'node->OperIsLIR()' #83332
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/superpmi/superpmicollect/superpmicollect.sh #83320
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAot] Test failure in System.Reflection.Context #83361
  • Do async state machines ever have Equals/GetHashCode called? #83323
  • How to force System.Text.Json deserializer to throw an exception when property is missing in JSON? #83357
  • PlatformNotSupportedException thrown by System.Drawing.Common on net7.0-windows10.0.22621.0 #81639

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Test Watcher Timeouts and Log Checker File Reading Issues #83427
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Default media type used when 'null' is passed to StringContent #81506 #83425
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Bump webpack from 5.68.0 to 5.76.0 in /src/mono/sample/wasm/browser-webpack #83420
    arch-wasm, area-codeflow, javascript
  • Bump webpack from 5.68.0 to 5.76.0 in /src/mono/sample/wasm/node-webpack #83418
    arch-wasm, area-codeflow, javascript
  • Implements Requires*Attribute on class behavior for NativeAOT #83417
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: fix bug in cloning conditions for jagged array #83414
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "[Merge-on-Red] - Implement Test Process Watcher" #83412
  • [browser] cleanup of early startup code #83411
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Add lowering for get_One, get_AllBitSet, createScalar(), createScalarUnsafe(). #83402
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add `ToggleBit` #83400
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Disable a failing System.Drawing.Primitives test. #83397
    area-System.Drawing
  • [NativeAOT] Support exporting methods from referenced assemblies in a formal way #83396
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Post 3.1.30 emscripten bump feedback #83391
    8.0.0
  • Allow certificate bundles for AIA fetching #83389
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Security
  • JIT: Prototype a generalized promotion pass #83388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change IsolatedStorageFile path for mobile #83380
    area-System.IO, os-android, os-ios
  • Emit GC info into a COMDAT section #83371
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [WIP][browser] Split into smaller es6 modules #83364
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Add INTERP_OPT_JITERPRETER so that jiterp is disabled in debug mode #83363
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono

Merged

  • JIT: Expand runtime lookups in a late phase #81635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add references to xunit.*.dll to CLRTest.Crossgen.targets #83413
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use IAttributeOperation for our attribute-based analyzers #83239
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Default media type used when 'null' is passed to StringContent #81506 #81722
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #83405
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #83404
    area-codeflow
  • [mono][interp] Add intrinsics for BitOperations #82827
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [NativeAOT] simpler ObjectHasComponentSize #83374
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove the defunct DiagnosticUtility/Fx classes from DataContractSerialization #82324
    area-Serialization
  • Test merging baseservices/threading #83143
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Another attempt to fix stress tests #83211
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: Stop relying on type handles in CSE #83306
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Override Write(Span) for CryptoStream to clear arrays before returning to pool #83338
    area-System.Security
  • Fix the compiling errors for LoongArch64 and delete unused code for armarch #83370
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove lvaPInvokeFrameRegSaveVar #83309
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] wasm memory snapshot into browser cache #82049
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Add missing 'MadeChanges = true' in gtSplitTree #83360
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not generate Equals/GetHashCode support for async state machines #83369
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix superpmi unit test on Alpine #83372
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not generate relocs to empty type dictionaries #83367
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Reduce duplicity in GVM analysis #83250
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Unify common cases of Array.Copy with CoreCLR #83351
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0][mono] Disable DoublinkList/dlstack tests #83268
  • [browser][debugger] Cleanup runtime_ready tests #83334
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [Mono] Fix address data emitted in the MonoProfilerGCRoots ETW event #83327
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-mono, 7.0.5
  • [release/7.0] Update emsdk #83244
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Convert to GeneratedRegexAttribute fixer should preserve references to const string fields #81997
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Fix threading startup after emscripten bump #83352
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Introduce AOT friendly version of ToLogFont and FromLogFont #81082
    area-System.Drawing, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Implement HResult swapping for generated COM methods. #83348
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Create source generator for configuration binding #82179
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Produce IL3000 and IL3001 from NativeAOT compiler #83253
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Fold unreachable cases for switch in importer. #82793
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [tasks] Add auto runtime initialization template to LibraryBuilder #83050
    area-Build-mono
  • CoreCLR support for InlineArrayAttribute. (struct layout part) #82744
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Implement JsonSerializerOptions.TypeInfoResolverChain. #83358
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Remove S.S.Permissions reference from S.DirectoryServices #82453
    area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Remove System.Drawing.Common from runtime #83356
    area-System.Drawing
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug CI #83266
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Allow multiple EventCounters sessions and make sure EventListners always send a Disable command #82970
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Adding support for Vector512 bitwise operations: And, AndNot, Or, OnesComplement, and Xor #83354
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Optimize `x < 0` and `x >= 0` #83176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0][mono] Use unsigned char when computing UTF8 string hashes #83302
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.5
  • Fix marshaller types in attributes for exception marshallers and fix non-generic managed type with generic marshaller cases #80461
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Add property to get owner composite executable #83339
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Use unsigned char when computing UTF8 string hashes #83303
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.16
  • [release/7.0] Fix special sweep issue for workstation #83342
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fixing a bug that causes us to mistakenly demote a gen2 region to gen0 #83341
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Arm64: Combine if conditions into compare chains #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Initial changes for GetLocaleInfoString #81470
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [Mono] Add more binary op intrinsics for ARM64 mini JIT #83337
    area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • Try to get more info about a named mutex creation failure #83186
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Threading, Future
  • EventPipe container types optimizations. #83251
    area-Tracing-mono
  • [browser] new EmccEnableAssertions and EmccEnvironment MSBuild props #82954
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Enable mono runtime to handle SIGTERM like CoreCLR #82806 #82813
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Remove EXTRA_*FLAGS. #82516
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize stackalloc zeroing via BLK #83255
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add x86 intrinsics to improve CRC32 performance #83321
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Allow Base64Decoder to ignore space chars, add IsValid methods and tests #79334
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Try to untangle the rid calculation. #82832
    community-contribution
  • Consider numeric string json for EnumConverter. #79432
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [System.Net] Introduce CIDR IPNetwork #82779
    area-System.Net

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GenAPI: __arglist is not preserved as a parameter #31196
  • Static web asset paths are absolute in a .NET 7 MVC project #31194

Closed

  • [GenAPI] missing `new` keyword on return types #30082
  • dotnet SDK 6.0.405 and 406 still requires dependencies after installing SDK+runtime in CBL-Mariner #30694
    Discussion
  • It was not possible to find any installed .NET Core SDKs #28539
    Discussion
  • `dotnet publish --os Linux` in .NET 7 references .NET 6 #28350
    Discussion
  • I have c# please send me solution #30445
    Discussion
  • Missing PackageDefinitions metadata after 7.0.200 update #30809
    Discussion
  • GenAPI outputs reference to internal type in assembly-level attribute #31098

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31203
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #31202
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Don't add AOT package in restore for < net7 #31201
    Area-NativeAOT
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #31197
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #31192
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #31191
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #31189
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [draft] moving dotnet/sdk-container-builds to dotnet/sdk #31181
  • Blazor configuration for StartupMemoryCache and Jiterpreter #31174
    Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • [GenAPI] add new keyword to member signature when base member is hidden #30932
    Area-GenAPI
  • Refactor command line options parsing, add/improve imp of --launch-profile and --no-launch-profile options. #31054
    Area-Watch
  • Fix race condition in BrowserRefreshServer #31105
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #31188
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Split static web assets SDK from the Razor SDK #31079
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.2xx #31190
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.3xx #31187
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #31186
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31135
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add tests for the operation(install/uninstall/update package) when global settings file is corrupted #30970
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add new line to C# project templates with file-scoped namespaces #30972
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Add new line to C# project templates with file-scoped namespaces #30973
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Cleanup and gen api should not reference internal type attribute argument #31158
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #31172
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.10.0 to 19.11.1 in /eng/dependabot #31151
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx

Updated

  • Interactive mode proof of concept #30832
  • WebAssembly SDK #31154
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Open issue]: static abstract interfaces and static classes #5783
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: method attribute target for records for targeting primary constructor #7047
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Cancel Async Functions Without Throw #4565

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • visual studio 2022 code search not working #67297
  • Question: how could I compile code with source generator #67296
  • `nameof(X)` in Interpolated String Handlers are not always lowered to constants #67295

Closed

  • `NotNullIfNotNull` does not flow when using delegates as method groups. #67288
  • Error message for invalid csharp_using_directive_placement is not clear #67299
  • CompilationEndAction action is never called in VS Code or JetBrains Rider with solution-wide analysis enabled. #67294
  • VS 2022 spell checker is considering c# keywords as spelling error #67181
  • Remove unused parameter IDE0060 should not fire for methods with an LoggerMessageAttribute #67253

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge release/dev17.6 to main #67301
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Port 66085 to 17.5 for servicing #67300
    Area-Analyzers, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Testing to 1.1.2-beta1.23163.2 #67298
    Area-IDE
  • [Test PR] Experiment #2 to identify analyzers reporting non-local diagnostics #67293
    Area-Analyzers
  • [Test PR] Experiment to identify analyzers reporting non-local diagnostics #67292
    Area-Analyzers

Merged

  • Update Language Feature Status.md #67304
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #67303
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #67302
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Initial binding and lowering of collection literals with single-valued elements #67025
  • Fix failure to expose IsExternalInit in net6.0 binaries #67171
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Rebuild fixes #67240
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Change the LOC target branch to 17.6 #67279
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #67291
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #67290
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove document from lsp misc workspace when it is found in normal workspace #67289
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Make Document Outline computation and update asynchronous. #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Implement Required Members for VB #66084
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Implement support for captured Primary Constructor parameters in EE when portable PDB is used. #67266
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Disallow pointers inside generic type-arguments unless in an unsafe context (in C#12 and beyond). #67282
    Area-Compilers
  • Framework compilers package for SDK consumption #66206
    Area-Compilers
  • Ignore file-local source declarations when searching for well-known types #67183
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Port Rename and Formatting tests to the new framework #67020
  • Hook up DidChangeConfiguration from client #66861
    Area-IDE
  • Allow missing placeholders and locals in RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #67092
    Area-Compilers
  • Bind extension declarations #67126
    Area-Compilers
  • Do not use the Lsp-Misc workspace in VS scenarios #67287
    Area-IDE
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Analyzer driver fixes for span-based analysis #67255
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Annotate MS.CA and MS.CA.C# for trimming #66519
    Area-Compilers
  • Move to one upstream ingestion feed #67263
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Implement 'Make field/property required' codefix #67175
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Improve EnC test helpers, add repro for #67243 #67252
    Area-Compilers, Area-Interactive
  • Switch integration CI to Preview Scout queue #67143
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Compute TextChange based on syntax instead of text #67120
    Area-IDE
  • Fix unimported completions show in places where they should not be #67283
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Preserve empty NodeStateTable entries #66963
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Bump Microsoft.ServiceHub.Framework to 4.2.70-beta #67071
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Generate branchless IL for `(b ? 1 : 0)` #67191
    Area-Compilers
  • Removed 'AnalyzerOptions' reference related to 'AdditionalFiles' #65851
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Allow nameof to access instance members. #48754
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Better parser error recovery when encountering a open generic name. #67278
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RequestDelegateGenerator throws NullReferenceException in ASP.NET Core 8 preview 2 #47202
  • Blazor WASM project fails to publish when updating WebCompiler nuget package #47201
  • Support binding form parameters in RDG #47200
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Authorization Unable to compile #47205
  • RDG doesn't support `BindAsync` result with differing nullability #47199
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Expose internal JSRuntime in ElementReference for static extensions #47197
  • RDG does not support certain `RouteHandlerBuilder` extension methods #47196
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef, https #47194
  • Perf improvement: updates #47193
  • RDG doesn't get JSON serialization info for awaitable response types #47192
    .NET 8 Planning
  • RDG doesn't handle `Task.CompletedTask` return #47191
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Blazor wasm/.NET 6/AAD] SignalR hub version negotiation fails with HTTP status 401 #47188
  • Form data naming strategy #47187
  • Generate self-signed certificate for local domain when debugging in Visual Studio #47186
  • The antiforgery token could not be decrypted - Only for specific user #47185
  • Perf regression: mvc, single_query #47184
  • IIS HTTP/2 headers only response with END_STREAM flag on headers #47183
  • Asp.net core mvc read request body is very slow #47182

Closed

  • Client.Client(connectionId) returing incorrect proxy connection #47189
    8.0-preview3
  • Consider supporting the --property flag on dotnet-watch #33726
    Backlog
  • (dotnet watch) - example command is invalid #40472
    Backlog
  • Hot Reload in dotnet-watch does not support passing MSBuild properties #39443
    Backlog
  • Inconsistent profile selection. `dotnet watch` selects different launch profile when `--no-hot-reload` is given #38408
    Backlog
  • Dotnet watch run command does not respect --no-launch-profile argument #45629
  • Split static web assets SDK from the Razor SDK #46997
    8.0-preview3
  • Automate template updates into dotnet/installer #45576
    .NET 8 Planning
  • QuickGrid documentation insufficiency #44446
    8.0-preview2
  • There was no runtime pack for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App available for the specified RuntimeIdentifier 'browser-wasm'. #45078
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_dapper, fortunes_dapper #47150
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, fortunes_dapper #47151
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, fortunes #47166
  • Blazor: Combine server and client to get the best of two worlds #35358
    8.0
  • Allow to use solution variables in .cshtml files #47172
  • Perf improvement: caching, fortunes, plainTextEmptyFilter #47158
  • Perf improvement: single_query #47177
  • Add NamedPipeTransportOptions.ListenerQueueCount property #46268
    8.0-preview2
  • Support TryParse parameter-binding scenarios in RequestDelegateGenerator #46335
    8.0-preview3
  • Enable nullability in RDG and address warnings #47148
    8.0-preview3

PullRequests

Created

  • More precise CPU instruction set specification for ASP.NET composite #47207
    area-infrastructure
  • Add src/DefaultBuilder/ to area-hosting #47206
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime
  • [release/7.0] Fix sending to another client from OnConnectedAsync #47204
    Servicing-consider, area-signalr, 7.0.x

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #47198
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.5
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #47195
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.16
  • Fix sending to another client from OnConnectedAsync #47203
    area-signalr, 8.0-preview3
  • Add link to known issues doc in diagnostic messages #47190
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview3
  • Added label mapping for area-hosting #47181
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Fix verb in route template with gRPC transcoding #47162
    Servicing-approved, area-grpc, 7.0.x
  • Implement request timeout middleware #46115
    area-runtime, community-contribution, blog-candidate
  • Improve endpoint metadata debugging #47163
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • RDG array handling. #47086
    area-runtime
  • Meter factory prototype #46834
    area-runtime, * NO MERGE *
  • Add generic variants of MVC attributes #47075

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Shadow not displaying properly in Border #13944

  • Expand/improve the .Net MAUI API for file selection/writing/reading #13939

  • Finalize templates for .NET 8 #13929

  • CollectionView on windows no longer resizes width when resizing window #13924
  • Entry Return command not firing up - .NET MAUI MVVM on Android #13921
    Backlog
  • .Net Maui UI issues on release apk (Text disappear on buttons) #13919
  • VS 2022 17.5 DEP0700 on Windows - "BaseSize="128,128"" is now required on MauiSplashScreen in csproj #13918
  • Upgrading to Visual Studio 17.5 broke MAUI Windows Slider #13917
    Backlog
  • :NET MAUI displays a list wrong on IOS, when the app was shortly in the background #13916
    Backlog

Closed

  • RadioButton has a weird dark background #5931

    Backlog
  • Entry show without Underline or Bottom line in MAUI GA #7487
    Backlog
  • Equivalent of WPF Style.Resources? #7364

  • .NET MAUI source view showing errors - lots of them! #7279
  • [Mac] MAUI Project doesn't build with classlib referenced #7163
  • WebView Navigation Bar disappears and flickers in landscape mode #7100
  • Update .NET MAUI Blazor project template name to include "Blazor Hybrid" #13804

    Backlog

  • OpenAPI CodeGen #3679

  • [Bug] Missing Add method for AbsoluteLayout that takes 3 args #3094
    Backlog
  • [Bug] RangeSlider (XCT compat renderer) is not shown using Grid #2696
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EF Core 7 Linq with a 'Contains" generates an SQL with an extra 'or is not null' #30483
  • Where() after conditional Select() of a navigation property fails with "Expression could not be translated" #30479
  • TemporalAll fails with JSON columns #30478
  • Separate caches for models and queries #30476
  • Public API to evict models from the cache #30475
  • When using sqlite to query a large amount of data, the memory increases #30474

Closed

  • JSON: optimize update path for single property element - don't wrap the value in json array #30410
    8.0.0
  • Consider removing unnecessary CASTs around JSON_VALUE #28881
    8.0.0-preview1
  • EF Core 8 + MVVM - ObservableCollection<string> gives errors in TPC #30459
  • Set operations over non-entity projections with different facets #19129
    8.0.0-preview3
  • Performance update #30473
  • efcore7 mysql8 jsonColumn null error #30472

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Fix to #30358 - Duplicate table alias in generated select query (An item with the same key has already been added) #30486
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.x
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #30485
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Stop using model references as identifiers in the in-memory database #30477
  • Add readme for EFcore.Desgin NuGet package #30471
  • Add readme file for nuget package EFCore.Tools #30470
  • Add readme for EF core Nuget Package #30469

Merged

  • [SMALL] Fix to #30358 - Duplicate table alias in generated select query (An item with the same key has already been added) #30484
  • Fix to #30410 - JSON: optimize update path for single property element - don't wrap the value in json array #30422
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #30481
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #30482
  • [release/7.0] Fix to #30273 - EF7 generating incorrect SQL for the Concat/Union All, The same code was working fine for EF6.4.4 #30451
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.5
  • Fix Typo #30480
    auto-merge
  • Stop checking store types for set operations #30468
